decks.notes: This Jund Aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures for value and leveraging the Cauldron Familiar and Witch's Oven combo to generate incremental advantage. Additionally, it includes cards like Mayhem Devil to punish opponents for every sacrifice made. The deck also has a small ramp package with the companion Jegantha, the Wellspring, and efficient removal spells like Fatal Push to control the board. It aims to pressure opponents with its aggressive creatures while disrupting their game plan with targeted removal and sacrificing synergies.

This deck focuses on aggressive human creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It includes cards that boost the power of human creatures and protect them, as well as cards that help bring out more human creatures onto the battlefield. With a mix of versatile creatures and lands that support the human tribe, the deck aims to maintain a fast-paced and powerful offense to defeat the opponent before they have a chance to react effectively.

The main idea of this deck is to use Enigmatic Incarnation to sacrifice creatures and tutor for powerful threats like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Linvala, the Preserver. The deck also utilizes Spara's Headquarters and Leyline Binding to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion, the deck can generate additional value through blinking permanents. The mana base is built around various triomes and other lands to ensure consistency in casting spells. Overall, the strategy revolves around controlling the game and deploying powerful threats to secure victory.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruption spells. By combining powerful creatures like Unstoppable Slasher and Bloodtithe Harvester with removal spells like Go for the Throat and Fatal Push, the deck aims to control the board while dealing direct damage to the opponent. Additionally, cards like Duress and Thoughtseize help disrupt the opponent's hand, allowing the deck to maintain a strong tempo and put the pressure on early in the game.

The deck focuses on maintaining early game aggression through creatures like Anointed Peacekeeper and Aven Interrupter, supported by mana dorks like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic. The deck also utilizes disruptive creatures like Archon of Emeria and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to slow down opponents and control the game. Collected Company is used to dig for creatures and generate card advantage. Skyclave Apparition provides removal while Eldrazi Displacer offers utility. The mana base includes dual lands to ensure consistent mana production, while Shefet Dunes provides a late-game finisher. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with strong creatures and disruptive elements.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively disrupt the opponent's game plan using disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, while deploying evasive threats like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Faerie Miscreant to apply pressure. The deck also utilizes cards like Enduring Curiosity to maintain card advantage and Brazen Borrower as a versatile tempo play. The mana base is optimized to support the color requirements of the deck's spells and creatures, allowing for consistent aggression and disruption in a Pioneer 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on utilizing Atraxa, Grand Unifier and various spells to combo off and create powerful board states. Indomitable Creativity is a key card in the deck, allowing for mass creature tokens to be created. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells such as Fatal Push and Pillage the Bog to control the board. The inclusion of cards like Thoughtseize and Ob Nixilis, the Adversary provide additional disruption for the opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creativity and powerful creatures to secure victory.

This deck revolves around utilizing Lotus Field and other cards to generate a large amount of mana quickly, allowing the player to cast powerful spells and combo off. The deck includes cards that can untap Lotus Field, search for it, and protect it from removal. The goal is to create a situation where the player can ultimately cast game-winning cards like Omniscience or Emergent Ultimatum. By strategically using the cards in the deck, the player can set up a devastating combo that overwhelms the opponent and secures victory.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo involving Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II to generate value and overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes disruption like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the game while setting up the combo pieces. The deck includes a mix of aggressive creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Overlord of the Balemurk, alongside removal spells and versatile cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. Skysovereign, Consul Flagship provides additional threats, and the mana base is designed to support the deck's strategy efficiently.
